import React from "react"; import '../styles/styleRegister.css' let url = "http://localhost:5000" export function Registrar (){ return(
) } function registrarDatos(){ let datos = { id: document.getElementById('id').value, name: document.getElementById('name').value, email: document.getElementById('email').value, password: document.getElementById('password').value } fetch(url+'/registrar', { method:'post', headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}, body:JSON.stringify(datos) }) .then(res => res.text()) .then(data => { alert(data) limpiar() .then( window.location.href = "http://localhost:3000/home" ); }) } function limpiar(){ document.getElementById('id').value = "" document.getElementById('name').value = "" document.getElementById('email').value = "" document.getElementById('password').value = "" }
